thread.title: Couple 'ALLERGIC to modern life' evicted from mud-hut | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Couple 'ALLERGIC to modern life' evicted from mud-hut | Daily Mail Online

author: Anthony Joseph For Mailonline
title: Couple 'ALLERGIC to modern life' evicted from mud-hut | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad Inside the house made of MUD: Woman who is 'allergic to rented housing' reveals how her ex-photocopier engineer husband gave up work to build their bizarre home - but they now face eviction Kate Burrows, 45, and husband Alan, 47, built their house from tree trunks, mud, straw and lime mortar Mrs Burrows said home cured her 'allergy to modern life', which was causing chronic 'flu like' symptoms But North Devon Council said they broke planning laws and told them to move out by December Published: 10:24 GMT, 28 February 2017 | Updated: 18:21 GMT, 28 February 2017 729 shares
